CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 发展；推进；推动；行进；进步；前进；提升；提拔；晋升；增值；上涨；使提前发生；提前；预付；预先支付；预付款项
进步；进展；发展；提升；提前；（价格、价值的）上涨；升值；提高；（尤指武装部队的）前进；行进；预付款；预支
预先的；预付的；提前的；先行的；前进的；进步的；事先的

synonym.mean: 提出；预付；使……前进；将……提前

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 先进的；高级的；晚期的；年老的
前进；增加；上涨（advance的过去式和过去分词形式）
前进者；相位超前补偿器，进相机

word_mean_info__list.difference: 中性词，既可指对好事的促进、推进，又可指对坏事的助长。
指在某一进程的任何时期或阶段提供积极的帮助与支持。
指能促进事物向前发展的因素，但这种因素并非决定性的。
口语用词，通常指利用自己的活动或影响推进某事。
通常指为加速某一进程或达到某个预期目的而给予有效的促进，强调作出有意识、决定性的努力。
多表自然过程，指生长，发展等稳定地或循环往复地前进。如：The year is progressing, it will soon be summer. (光阴似箭，很快又是夏天了。)
强调从一处向另一处的运动，常表停顿后继续前进。如：They proceeded from London to Paris. (他们从伦敦往巴黎前进。)
表向一个特定的目的地，在一定的时间或空间内稳定地向前运动。如：Napoleon’s army advanced on Moscow. (拿破仑的军队向莫斯科挺进。)
指按某一既定目标前进，取得发展，目的性很明确，强调经常和稳定地前进。
非正式用语，侧重从某一停止点向某地前进，但不表示前进的目的地。
主要用于具体的人或物，也可指科学技术和运动等。
最常用词，含义宽泛而不确切，依上文确定其具体意思。

word_group.brief_definition: 预先, 事先, 提前
在...取得进展；在...取得进步；发展...
预先付款；提前付款；预付款
先遣队；先遣小组；先遣班子
技术进步；技术进展；科技进步
预支现金；预付现金；现金垫款
预先缴付；提前支付；预付

bilingual.source: Don't forget to check in online and print your boarding pass in advance.
bilingual.target: 别忘了在线值机并提前打印登机牌。

bilingual.source: His work on Chen's Theorem made an important advance towards proving Goldbach's Conjecture.
bilingual.target: 他在陈氏定理上的工作对证明哥德巴赫猜想取得了重要进展。

bilingual.source: Going back to Walter Scott's lines, we may find even white lies have results we cannot know in advance.
bilingual.target: 回到沃尔特·斯科特的台词，我们可能会发现即使是善意的谎言也会有我们无法预知的结果。

bilingual.source: They asked us to pay in advance.
bilingual.target: 他们要求我们提前付款。

bilingual.source: We should pay the fee in advance.
bilingual.target: 我们应该提前支付费用。
他提前完成了所有的工作。

bilingual.source: We need to book a room in advance.
bilingual.target: 我们需要提前预订房间。
我们需要提前收到预告。

bilingual.source: We need to advance plan this trip.
bilingual.target: 我们需要提前计划这次旅行。

list.abstract: advance（英[ədˈvɑːns]，美[ədˈvæns]），英语单词，作动词用，为前进；借…给；进步。作名词用，为前进；预付款；挑逗。作形容词时，为提前的；预先的。短语搭配有in advance（预先），例句为“It contributes greatly to the advance of society as a whole.（它对整个社会的进步做出了巨大的贡献。）” advance名词类近义词有development、growth等，名词形式为advancement、advancer，形容词形式为advanced、advancing。advances为advance的复数形式和第三人称单数。

yingyinNormal.en: Tomorrow we advance on the Western front.
yingyinNormal.zh: 明天，我们将挺进西部前线。

yingyinNormal.en: Make all these ingredients, prepare them in advance. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 提前准备好所有原材料。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, yes, but there's usually planning, courtship, advance notice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有的，但通常要计划，求爱，并且提前通知。

yingyinNormal.en: Board's rejected your proposal. They've chosen to advance other programs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 董事会拒绝了你的申请, 他们准备让其他项目上马。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Rise of the Planet of the Apes》

yingyinNormal.en: To slow our advance, President Snow is building a minefield of traps.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为了阻滞我们的前进，斯诺总统布下了雷区陷阱。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the greatest advance in modern physics since the splitting of the atom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是近代物理学自成功核分裂后的最大发现。

yingyinNormal.en: I want every camera watching. We will turn their advance into a celebration of suffering.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要每一个摄像机都开着，我们将把他们的前进变成痛苦的狂欢。

yingyinNormal.en: I made a written record request 72 hours in advance. I checked the tire pressure on the car.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我提前七十二个小时提交了书面申请，我检查了车的胎压。

yingyinNormal.en: I've told our over-stimulated friend to advance the saloon heist a week and make it twice as bloody.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我已经让那位狂暴的朋友提前一周去洗劫酒吧，并让血腥程度翻倍。

yingyinNormal.en: John Harrison was a fiction created the moment I was awoken by your Admiral Marcus to help him advance his cause.
yingyinNormal.zh: 约翰·哈里森这个名字是你们的马库斯将军在我醒来的时候，捏造的名字，只是为了帮助他推进他的事业。

yingyinNormal.en: And as a result, I am heading to Washington right now so that we can decide exactly how we should stop this ICO advance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此，我现在就前往华盛顿来讨论怎样阻止这次哈里发国的进攻。

yingyinNormal.en: You two should be ashamed of yourselves. Using women to advance your cause with sexuality, and whatever Amy plans on doing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们两个真是不知羞耻，利用女人的性感来争取自己事业的上位，还有不管艾米准备做什么。

yingyinNormal.en: If we really want science to advance, people should have chips implanted in their skulls that explode when they say something stupid.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果真想要科学进步，人们应该在脑子里植入杀人晶片，只要一说蠢话，就炸烂他们的脑袋。

yingyinNormal.en: OK. So you could do all of this in advance before they come home for tea? Yeah, absolutely. And then all you have to do is assemble it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你可以在他们回来喝下午茶之前提前准备好所有这些？当然。剩下的就是混合食材了。

yingyinNormal.en: ICO began its advance from As Suwar late last night, and by our calculations and their current pace, we expect them to reach the Euphrates within 72 hours.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哈里发国已于昨晚深夜从苏瓦尔出发，根据我们的计算及他们目前的行军速度，我们预计他们会在72小时以内到达幼发拉底河。

yingyinNormal.en: This weekend, I'll depart for Asia to advance American leadership and promote American jobs in a dynamic region that will be critical to our security and prosperity in the century ahead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个周末，我要前往亚洲促进美国领导力在这一颇具活力地区发挥作用也促进我们美国人的就业，这一地区对我们在未来一个世纪的安全与繁荣至关重要。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 促进；发展；进步；提拔

word_family.mean: v. 前进；借…给；进步；预付；提前支付；使…提前发生；加速…进程；促进（人；事业；计划）的发展；提出；涨价

sense_info_list.en:
make or cause to make progress;
progress or a development in a particular activity or area of understanding

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Advances</highlight> in technology have allowed mass-market labels to react to trends more quickly and anticipate demand more precisely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 技术的进步使大众市场的品牌能够更迅速地对趋势做出反应，更准确地预测需求。

examination_example.sentence: As the industry <highlight>advances</highlight>, however, other suits may have an even greater impact.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，随着该行业的发展，其他诉讼可能会产生更大的影响。

examination_example.sentence: Lengthy periods of economic stagnation or decline have almost always have usually stopped or reversed the <highlight>advance</highlight> of rights and freedoms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 长期的经济停滞或衰退几乎总是会阻止或逆转权利和自由的进步。

examination_example.sentence: Consider the person that you're dealing with in <highlight>advance</highlight> and what will get you to your desired outcome.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提前考虑一下你要打交道的人，以及怎样才能达到你想要的结果。

examination_example.sentence: This is how far in <highlight>advance</highlight> authorities are recommending people show up to catch a domestic flight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 官方刚开始建议民众提前两小时到达机场赶国内航班，现在建议提前三小时。

examination_example.sentence: So plan your week's menu in <highlight>advance</highlight>, making shopping lists for your ingredients in their exact quantities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以，提前计划好你一周的菜单，按照食材的确切数量列出购物清单。

sense_info_list.en: put forward a theory or suggestion

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在...取得进展；在...取得进步；发展...

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 促进；发展；进步；提拔

word_family.mean: v. 前进；借…给；进步；预付；提前支付；使…提前发生；加速…进程；促进（人；事业；计划）的发展；提出；涨价

sense_info_list.en:
make or cause to make progress;
progress or a development in a particular activity or area of understanding

examination_example.sentence: I've reported that <highlight>advances</highlight> in livestock protection are happening with scientists painting eyes on the butts of cows.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我曾报道说，随着科学家在牛屁股上画上眼睛，家畜保护正在取得进展。

examination_example.sentence: Much has been written about how the relationship between scientists and the media can shape the efficient transmission of scientific <highlight>advances</highlight> to the public.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 关于科学家与媒体之间的关系，是如何影响科学进步向公众的有效传播，已有许多文献对此报道。

examination_example.sentence: With continuing <highlight>advances</highlight> in individual genome(基因组)sequencing and the advent of personalized medicine, more non-scientists will need to be comfortable analyzing complex scientific information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着个人基因组测序的不断进步和个性化医学的出现，更多的非科学家将会轻松分析复杂的科学信息。

sense_info_list.en: put forward a theory or suggestion

examination_example.sentence: The "screen time" hypothesis <highlight>advanced</highlight> by researchers is that electronic devices and excessive time spent online may have reversed these trends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由研究人员提出的“屏幕时间”假说是，电子设备和在网上花费过多的时间可能已经扭转了这些趋势。

sense_info_list.en: cause an event to occur at an earlier date than planned

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指为加速某一进程或达到某个预期目的而给予有效的促进, 强调作出有意识、决定性的努力。
中性词, 既可指对好事的促进、推进, 又可指对坏事的助长。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 促进；发展；进步；提拔

word_family.mean: v. 前进；借…给；进步；预付；提前支付；使…提前发生；加速…进程；促进（人；事业；计划）的发展；提出；涨价

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在...取得进展；在...取得进步；发展...

sense_info_list.en:
make or cause to make progress; 
progress or a development in a particular activity or area of understanding

examination_example.sentence: The vital assistant became so <highlight>advanced</highlight> and realistic that the students didn't know she was a computer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虚拟助手变得十分先进和逼真，以至于学生们都不知道她其实是一台电脑。

examination_example.sentence: As a result, the public is divided about whether the imbalance in corporate America will change in the foreseeable future, even though women have made major <highlight>advances</highlight> in the workplace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公众在“美国企业界领导层性别失衡是否会在可预见的未来发生改变”这一问题上产生了分歧，尽管女性在职场上取得了重大进步。

examination_example.sentence: Career interruptions related to motherhood may make it harder for women to <highlight>advance</highlight> in their careers and compete for top executive jobs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 生养孩子导致工作中断，这可能让女性难以在事业上更进一步，因而无力竞争高级管理职位。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Advances</highlight> in AI will make human beings smarter, more able and "just better human beings".
examination_example.sentence_trans: AI的进步将使人类变得更聪明、更有能力，“只会是更好的人类”。

examination_example.sentence: Indoor pollution, which includes sources like home heating and cooking, has remained constant over the past several decades despite <highlight>advances</highlight> in the area.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 室内污染，包括家庭取暖和烹饪等来源，尽管该地区取得了进步，但在过去几十年中一直保持不变。

examination_example.sentence: They assume that if and when they have children, it will be even harder for them to <highlight>advance</highlight> in their careers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果有了孩子，那她们的职场晋升之路怕是难上加难。

examination_example.sentence: The state program allows them to maximize the number of honors and <highlight>Advanced</highlight> Placement classes they can take.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该项目最大限度地增加他们可以获得的荣誉和高级预修课程的数量。

examination_example.sentence: The survey commissioned by the district found that 68 percent of high school honor and <highlight>Advanced</highlight> Placement students reported feeling stressed about school "always or most of the time."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学区的一项调查显示，有68%的高中三好学生和跳级生总是甚至无时无刻不在承受着来自学校的巨大压力。

sense_info_list.en: put forward a theory or suggestion

examination_example.sentence: UK universities are world leaders when it comes to <highlight>advancing</highlight> and promoting gender equality.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在推进和促进性别平等方面，英国大学处于世界领先地位。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指为加速某一进程或达到某个预期目的而给予有效的促进，强调作出有意识、决定性的努力。
中性词，既可指对好事的促进、推进，又可指对坏事的助长。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 促进；发展；进步；提拔

word_family.mean: v. 前进；借…给；进步；预付；提前支付；使…提前发生；加速…进程；促进（人；事业；计划）的发展；提出；涨价

sense_info_list.en: make or cause to make progress; progress or a development in a particular activity or area of understanding

examination_example.sentence: Great improvements in public health have been brought about by <highlight>advances</highlight> in medical science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公共健康的大幅改善是医学的进步带来的。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Advances</highlight> in science will offer new perspectives (视角) from which to study how people manage their lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学的进步将为研究人们如何管理自己的生活提供新的视角。

examination_example.sentence: It doesn't feel as alone as it may have before all the <highlight>advances</highlight> in technology.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在科技进步之前，人们并不会像原来那样感觉孤单。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>advance</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提前

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Advance</highlight> bookings are required.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 需要提前预订。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常指为加速某一进程或达到某个预期目的而给予有效的促进，强调作出有意识、决定性的努力。
中性词，既可指对好事的促进、推进，又可指对坏事的助长。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The speed and force of the huge waves there makes it impossible to know in <highlight>advance</highlight> when they are coming.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那里巨浪的速度和力量让人无法提前知道它们何时到来。

examination_example.sentence: Visit us on the website to place your order for a group in <highlight>advance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 访问我们的网站，提前为团队下订单。

examination_example.sentence: To rent the house, you need to pay $ 1200 in <highlight>advance</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果想租这所房子，你需要预付1200美元。

sense_info_list.en: make or cause to make progress; progress or a development in a particular activity or area of understanding

examination_example.sentence: A report on bats was published this month in the journal Science <highlight>Advances</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一份关于蝙蝠的报告发表在本月的《科学进展》杂志上。
